{{also|桃园}}
==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=桃园}}

===Etymology===
For the place in Taiwan, shortened from {{etyl|nan|zh}} {{zh-l|桃仔園|tr=Thô-á-hn̂g}}, which was used alongside {{lang|zh|桃園／桃园}} by the time of the {{w|Guangxu Emperor}}. Found in official Qing documents by 1888.
